did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Rockett, Burkhead & Winslow (RBW) was a Raleigh-based advertising agency that operated from 1985-2009.
Accession (2009-0133) includes CDs, videotapes, DVDs, samples of print advertisements, awards, and USB drives with documents from RBW. Clients include Glaxo, Cort, Dollar Tree, Volvo, and Reed's.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection is restricted for 5 years on unpublished materials.
Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Rockett, Burkhead & Winslow (RBW) Archives, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Rockett, Burkhead & Winslow (RBW) Archives were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2009.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection is minimally processed: materials may not have been ordered and described beyond their original condition.
Descriptive sources and standards used to create this inventory: DACS, EAD, NCEAD guidelines, and our local Style Guide.
This finding aid is NCEAD compliant.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Rockett, Burkhead & Winslow (RBW) was an integrated marketing communications agency that was based in Raleigh, North Carolina, and had clients including BB&T, CORT, Glaxo, Volvo, Dollar Tree, and Reed's. It opened in 1985 and by 1997 had over 120 employees, but declined in size and operations over the next decade. RBW suffered serious financial losses due to clients' trimmed advertising budgets, finally closing permanently in February 2009.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection was acquired as Rockett, Burkhead & Winslow (RBW) was closing in Spring of 2009. It consists of posterboards with sample advertisements; videotapes and DVDs of commercials; CDs with advertisements and other client-related materials; USB flash drives with RBW documents (these have been copied to Duke's Electronic Records server); and awards and trophies from various organizations for excellence in advertising.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is unprocessed; it has been reboxed in the condition that it arrived. CDs were labelled according to date or client, but they have not been sorted or arranged further. There has been no attempt to verify the accuracy of labels.
